alert.note: Alert for Burke; Mountrail (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 2:12AM CDT until July 19 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR NORTHERN WARD...WESTERN BOTTINEAU...RENVILLE...NORTHWESTERN MCHENRY...SOUTHEASTERN BURKE AND NORTHEASTERN MOUNTRAIL COUNTIES... At 212 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Glenburn, or 18 miles southeast of Mohall, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mohall, Minot Air Force Base, Kenmare, Berthold, Westhope, Glenburn, Lansford, Sherwood, Carpio, Foxholm, Newburg, Greene, Maxbass, Donnybrook, Antler, Blaisdell, Coulee, Tolley, Landa and Norma. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
